pages.text: O-Undead Horses replace both Skeleton and Zombie horses. You can see some of their rotted, exposed bone on the surface of their skin, and they’re also… dusty. $(br2)Undead Horses can do pretty much everything a normal horse can do. However, they don’t have quite as much health, and they aren’t very fast. They can, however, walk atop powdered snow!
Undead Horses can’t have markings/ patterns like normal horses. They can, however, come in all of the same base colors as O-Horses.
